mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, menu_url, parent_id, menu_type, menu_order, state from sys_menu where state != -1

select ta.menu_id, ta.menu_name, ta.menu_url, ta.parent_id, ta.menu_type, ta.menu_order, tb.menu_id as sub_menu_id, tb.menu_name as sub_menu_name, tb.menu_url as sub_menu_url, tb.parent_id as sub_parent_id, tb.menu_type as sub_menu_type, tb.menu_order as sub_menu_order from ( select menu_id, menu_name, menu_url, parent_id, menu_type, menu_order from sys_menu where parent_id = 0 and state !=-1 ) as ta left join ( select menu_id, menu_name, menu_url, parent_id, menu_type, menu_order from sys_menu ) as tb on ta.menu_id = tb.parent_id
select menu_id, menu_name, menu_url, parent_id, menu_type, menu_order, state from sys_menu where state != -1 and parent_id=#{parent_id}
select menu_id, menu_name, menu_url, parent_id, menu_type, menu_order, state from sys_menu where sys_menu=#{sys_menu}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu ( menu_name, menu_url, parent_id, menu_order ) values ( #{menu_name}, #{menu_url}, #{parent_id}, #{menu_order} )
mapper.update: update sys_menu set menu_name=#{menu_name}, menu_url=#{menu_url}, parent_id=#{parent_id}, menu_order=#{menu_order} where menu_id=#{menu_id}
update sys_menu set state=-1 where menu_id=#{menu_id}
